valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Tue 13 Jan 2026 to 18:00 (UTC) on Wed 14 Jan 2026

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, cyclonic 4, becoming southwesterly 5 to 7. In east, southeasterly 6 to gale 8, occasionally severe gale 9, veering southwesterly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In west, moderate or rough. in east, rough, occasionally very rough at first.
Weather
In west, showers. In east, occasional rain.
Visibility
Good, occasionally poor.
